answerText: Heart of Darkness [10] This member of the Ogoni people of Nigeria was arrested and hanged in 1995 for nonviolently protesting against crude oil extraction in his homeland. His most famous novel is narrated by the soldier Mene, who loves Agnes.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | VCU + Michigan State  | 1 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer some tired bonus parts about Nigerian literature, for 10 points each. [10] In his essay "An Image of Africa," the Nigerian novelist Chinua Achebe exposed the racism of this novel about Marlowe's journey up the Congo to find Kurtz.
